description.narrative: "The Oversight of Palestinian Law Enforcement Institutions and Enhancing Anti-Corruption Efforts 2011-2013" is a joint donor programme with a total budget of EUR 2.5 million. The programme was aligned with "the Palestinian National Development Plan 2011-2013" to create a secure and stable internal environment in which social and economic development can take place. The programme was designed to support rule of law, good governance and human rights through support to selected security and rights-based accountability mechanisms in the Palestinian Authority. It included support to the Palestinian Civil Police's internal accountability units, national institutions working with anti-corruption, civil society organisations working on accountability and oversight issues. The programme was prepared in close collaboration with relevant PA institutions and it built on an extensive cooperation with EUPOL COPPS. The Danish contribution was DKK 9.9 million.
